title: Foundation in IT Basics & A/L Studies
description: Any A/L stream is viable, but the Technology or Maths stream is advantageous. Focus on self-learning basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals through online resources.

title: Diploma or Degree in IT/Software Engineering
description: Enroll in a higher education program to get a structured understanding of software development principles. This is where you will dive deep into programming languages and frameworks.

title: Junior Developer & Portfolio Building
description: Secure a role as a Junior Web or Mobile Developer. Focus on building a strong portfolio of projects. Contribute to open-source projects to showcase your skills and ability to collaborate.

title: Mid-Level Developer
description: As a mid-level developer, you'll take on more complex features and have more ownership of the codebase. You'll be expected to work more independently and contribute to architectural decisions.
institutes: All major tech companies and startups in Sri Lanka

title: Senior Developer / Tech Lead
description: Advance to a senior role where you'll mentor junior developers, lead technical design for projects, and solve the most challenging technical problems. You can specialize in frontend, backend, mobile, or full-stack development.
qualifications: Deep expertise in one or more tech stacks
